name: TVCollectionViewDelegateFullScreenLayout
desc: Methods that send notifications of events during cell transitions.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, layout: UICollectionViewLayout, willCenterCellAt: IndexPath)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when a cell is to be the center cell.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, layout: UICollectionViewLayout, didCenterCellAt: IndexPath)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when a cell has completed the transition and has become the center cell.
